scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist && touch dist/.keep
scripts.build:android: node generate.js --source=../assets --dest=./dist --extension=svg && sh tools/vd-tool/bin/vd-tool -c -in ./dist -out ./dist && rm ./dist/*.svg && avocado $(find ./dist/ -type f ! -name "*_selector.xml") && replace '#212121' '@color/fluent_default_icon_tint' ./dist/* && replace '"http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"' '"http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:autoMirrored="true"' $(awk '$0="./dist/"$0".xml"' rtl.txt)
scripts.deploy:android: npm run build:android && rm -rf ../android/library/src/main/res/drawable && mkdir ../android/library/src/main/res/drawable && cp -a ./dist/*.xml ../android/library/src/main/res/drawable && npm run clean
scripts.deploy:ios: npm run build:ios && python3 process_ios_assets.py && npm run clean
scripts.build:flutter: node generate.js --source=../assets --dest=./dist --extension=svg && mkdir dist/flutter && npm run generate:flutter-font-regular && npm run generate:flutter-font-filled && npm run generate:flutter-icon-lib-class && npm run generate:flutter-icon-demo-class
scripts.generate:flutter-font-regular: icon-font-generator dist/*_regular.svg -o dist/flutter --name FluentSystemIcons-Regular --types ttf --html false --css false --codepoints ./font_codepoints/FluentSystemIcons-Regular.json
scripts.generate:flutter-font-filled: icon-font-generator dist/*_filled.svg -o dist/flutter --name FluentSystemIcons-Filled --types ttf --html false --css false --codepoints ./font_codepoints/FluentSystemIcons-Filled.json
scripts.deploy:flutter: npm run build:flutter && cp dist/flutter/*.ttf ../flutter/lib/fonts && cp dist/flutter/*.dart ../flutter/lib && cp dist/flutter/*.json font_codepoints/ && npm run clean
